author: cms-tsg-storm
body:
backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/50171

#### PR description:

Development of HLT menus for `CMSSW_16_0_X`:
   * This is the PR for the 16_0_X branch (this is the release cycle currently used for Run-3 HLT-menu development).
  
These updates correspond to the updates corresponding to the first version "V1.0" of the GRun menu for the 2026 pp data-taking.
This update includes the integration of the following JIRA tickets:

- [CMSHLT-3713](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3713) [TSG/FOG] Add high-rate ZeroBias and DQM stream to the TrackerVR menu
- [CMSHLT-3715](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3715) [AlCa/ECAL] Updates for `AlCa_EcalPhiSym` path for 2026 pp and HIon menu
- [CMSHLT-3716](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3716) [HIG/B2G] Integration of HLT paths with new `PNet-MD` model
- [CMSHLT-3718](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3718) [HIG/BTV] Integration of `GloParT` `AK15` for 2026 menu
- [CMSHLT-3720](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3720) [BPH] Low-PU 2026 DiMuon path with unconstrained mass range
- [CMSHLT-3724](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3724) [TRK] HLT-Tracking updates for 2026 menu: CA tuning
- [CMSHLT-3725](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3725) [EXO] Integration of `CICADA` kHz Parking Paths for 2026
- [CMSHLT-3727](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3727) [TSG/Scouting] Request to reduce prescale of `DST_PFScouting_SingleMuonMonitorJPsi` from 100 to 10
- [CMSHLT-3728](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3728) [EXO] Delayed Jet 2026 HLT Trigger Menu Modifications
- [CMSHLT-3729](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3729) [EXO] Integration of `AXOL1TL` Parking Paths for 2026
- [CMSHLT-3730](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3730) [HIG] Addition of HLT Paths seeded by L1 `TOPO` ML trigger for HH searches in the muon channel
- [CMSHLT-3732](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3732) [TSG/Scouting] Addition of PPS Digi collections in HLT Scouting for 2026 data-taking
- [CMSHLT-3738](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3738) [SMP/HIN] New path `Photon30_HoverELoose` seeded by `L1_SingleEG20er2p5` for low pileup
- [CMSHLT-3739](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3739) [SMP/HIN] Extra `PFJet` paths for low pileup runs
- [CMSHLT-3749](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3749) [TSG] PS columns for 2026 lowPU
- [CMSHLT-3750](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3750) [TSG] PD splitting for 2026 standard PU   

In addition this PR introduces the following commits:
   * 8e6a8f72597dfa981488158c24df99116f45d1eb : update of `FULL`, `GRun` and `Special` L1T menu in TSG GTs to `L1Menu_Collisions2026_v1_0_0_xml`
   * 37b6876dcede53eaac7e652b6cd48599637c60d8 : update `hltPathOwners.json` for 2026 `GRun` V.10 menu
   * dbcd033b47ddd4fee123670ec10e5796c54639da : Bumped version of Paths for HLT `GRun`-2026 V1.0
   * 2941ee7967dab54122714352ca52557a7856a528 : remove frozen menu 2025 v1.3 and introduce new frozen menu 2026 v1.0

#### PR validation:

TSG integration tests.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/50171 to the current TSG production cycle (`CMSSW_16_0_X`)
title: HLT menu development for `16_0_X` (3/N)
